SorcererLevel5Spells.Name: Animate Objects
SorcererLevel5Spells.Description: Objects come to life at your command.

SorcererLevel5Spells.Name: Cloudkill
SorcererLevel5Spells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of poisonous, yellow-green fog centered on a point you choose within range.

SorcererLevel5Spells.Name: Cone of Cold
SorcererLevel5Spells.Description: A blast of cold air erupts from your hands.

SorcererLevel5Spells.Name: Creation
SorcererLevel5Spells.Description: You pull wisps of shadow material from the Shadowfell to create a nonliving object of vegetable matter within range.

SorcererLevel5Spells.Name: Dominate Person
SorcererLevel5Spells.Description: You attempt to beguile a humanoid that you can see within range.

SorcererLevel5Spells.Name: Hold Monster
SorcererLevel5Spells.Description: Choose a creature that you can see within range.

SorcererLevel5Spells.Name: Insect Plague
SorcererLevel5Spells.Description: Swarming, biting locusts fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range.

SorcererLevel5Spells.Name: Seeming
SorcererLevel5Spells.Description: This spell allows you to change the appearance of any number of creatures that you can see within range.

SorcererLevel5Spells.Name: Telekinesis
SorcererLevel5Spells.Description: You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought.

SorcererLevel5Spells.Name: Teleportation Circle
SorcererLevel5Spells.Description: As you cast the spell, you draw a 10-foot-diameter circle on the ground inscribed with sigils that link your location to a permanent teleportation circle of your choice whose sigil sequence you know.

SorcererLevel5Spells.Name: Wall of Stone
SorcererLevel5Spells.Description: A nonmagical wall of solid stone springs into existence at a point you choose within range.
